statements.select: select t.T_ID, t.T_PONDID, t.T_CARNAME1, t.T_CARNAME2, t.T_JZXH_PLAN, t.T_JZXH, t.T_DISTINGUISH_RESULT, t.T_DISTINGUISH_TIME, t.T_JZXH_PICADDRESS1, t.T_JZXH_PICADDRESS2, t.T_RESERVE1, t.T_RESERVE2, t.T_RESERVE3, t.T_RESERVE4 from SM_REEFERCONTAINERNO_INFO t order by t.T_DISTINGUISH_TIME desc

select t.T_ID, t.T_PONDID, t.T_CARNAME1, t.T_CARNAME2, t.T_JZXH_PLAN, t.T_JZXH, t.T_DISTINGUISH_RESULT, t.T_DISTINGUISH_TIME, t.T_JZXH_PICADDRESS1, t.T_JZXH_PICADDRESS2, t.T_RESERVE1, t.T_RESERVE2, t.T_RESERVE3, t.T_RESERVE4 from SM_REEFERCONTAINERNO_INFO t where 1=1
t.T_PONDID=#pondId#
t.T_JZXH=#containerNo#
t.T_DISTINGUISH_TIME between #startTime# and #endTime#
order by t.T_DISTINGUISH_TIME desc

select coalesce(A.磅房,B.磅房) PONDNO, (coalesce(A.SuccessCount,0)+coalesce(B.FailCount,0)) TOTALNUM, coalesce(A.SuccessCount,0) as DISTINGUISHSECUSESS, coalesce(B.FailCount,0) as DISTINGUISHFAIL, coalesce(round(A.SuccessCount/(coalesce(A.SuccessCount,0)+coalesce(B.FailCount,0))*100,2),0)||'%' DISTINGUISHRATE from (select count(t.T_DISTINGUISH_RESULT) as SuccessCount, t.T_PONDID 磅房编号, p.c_poundsitename 磅房 from SM_REEFERCONTAINERNO_INFO t left join SM_PoundSite_Info p on t.T_PONDID=p.C_PoundSiteNo where t.T_DISTINGUISH_RESULT='Y'
t.T_PONDID=#pondId#
t.T_JZXH=#containerNo#
t.T_DISTINGUISH_TIME between #startTime# and #endTime#
group by t.T_PONDID,p.c_poundsitename order by t.T_PONDID ) A full join ( select count(t.T_DISTINGUISH_RESULT) as FailCount, t.T_PONDID 磅房编号, p.c_poundsitename 磅房 from SM_REEFERCONTAINERNO_INFO t left join SM_PoundSite_Info p on t.T_PONDID=p.C_PoundSiteNo where t.T_DISTINGUISH_RESULT='N'
t.T_PONDID=#pondId#
t.T_JZXH=#containerNo#
t.T_DISTINGUISH_TIME between #startTime# and #endTime#
group by t.T_PONDID,p.c_poundsitename order by t.T_PONDID ) B on A.磅房编号=B.磅房编号
statements.insert: insert into SM_REEFERCONTAINERNO_INFO ( T_PONDID, T_CARNAME1, T_CARNAME2, T_JZXH_PLAN, T_JZXH, T_DISTINGUISH_RESULT, T_DISTINGUISH_TIME, T_JZXH_PICADDRESS1, T_JZXH_PICADDRESS2, T_RESERVE1, T_RESERVE2, T_RESERVE3, T_RESERVE4 )values ( #T_PONDID#, #T_CARNAME1#, #T_CARNAME2#, #T_JZXH_PLAN#, #T_JZXH#, #T_DISTINGUISH_RESULT#, #T_DISTINGUISH_TIME#, #T_JZXH_PICADDRESS1#, #T_JZXH_PICADDRESS2#, #T_RESERVE1#, #T_RESERVE2#, #T_RESERVE3#, #T_RESERVE4# )
